title: tilt
text:
This website gives overviews the technical aspects of the tilt ecosystem.
Most links are public but some are restricted to the members of the domain 2degrees-investing.org, the members of the GitHub organization 2DegreesInvesting, or specific people.

title: tilt

title: tilt
text:
Relevant GitHub repositories
This website mentions a number of GitHub repositores under our GitHub organization. I avoid direct links so that this website remains accurate if the repositories move to a different organization. Search our repositories at https://github.com/orgs/2DegreesInvesting/repositories.
Our GitHub organization has many repositories. The most relevant ones use the prefix “tilt” (e.g. tiltIndicator) and the topic “tiltsmes”.

Search public repositories.
Search private repositories.

title: tilt
text:
The app
From all repos, the ones most relevant to the app are these:

tiltWebTool
tiltWebToolData
tiltOutput

For more details see the home page of each repo.

title: tilt
section: How to find the most relevant repos
text:
How to find the most relevant repos
This website mentions a number of GitHub repositores (repos) under our GitHub organization. I avoid direct links so that this website remains accurate if the repos move to a different organization. Search our repos at https://github.com/orgs/2DegreesInvesting/repositories.
Our GitHub organization has many repos. The most relevant ones use the prefix “tilt” (e.g. tiltIndicator) and the topic “tiltsmes”.

title: tilt
section: How to understand what each repo
text:
How to understand what each repo
The best place to unserstand what each repo is about is it’s home page on GitHub.

At the top you’ll find an “About” seciton with useful information and/or links:




image



Scroll past folders and files to read about the goal of the repo and any relevant information, typically about the “Installation” and at least one “Example”.




image
